metadata.title: CVE-2019-16707 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Hunspell 1.7.0 has an invalid read operation inSuggestMgr::leftcommonsubstring in suggestmgr.cxx.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

enchant: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
hunspell package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
